name: Racionabilia
description: The Racionabilia is one of the oldest countries, and its political system has been the same for centuries. An absolute monarch directs the country and only a male heir can succeed.
cp: The farm economy is the main piliar of the Racionabilia. If its economical empire falls, the player loses.

name: Sovetskiy
description:
The Sovetskiy operated in the same way as the Racionabalia 200 years ago, but a great popular revolution led by a leader.
The revolutionaries took power and their leader became the new leader of the country advocating ideas to reduce social and ethnic inequalities.
cp: The general Ulron is the only one who can manage Soviestkiy armies. If he's killed, the player loses.

name: E.D.U
description: The E.D.U is undoubtedly the most powerful nation on Framtid either military or technological.
cp: E.D.U politicians are almost all corrupted and don't represent their people. If bureaucracy corruption is revelead and proved, the player loses.

name: Hitobito
description:
The Hitobito is the youngest country it is known in its current form only for 50 years.
The people set up a new political system combining anarchism and democracy, people all equal in law with a forum chaired by citizens of the country drawn by lot.
cp: Hitobito members are knowed for  their cohesion. If discord settles down, the player loses.
